title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio built with React and Bootstrap.

title: E-commerce Store
description: An online store with cart functionality and admin panel.

title: Weather App
description: A weather forecasting app using OpenWeather API.

title: AI Chatbot Interface
description: A React-based chatbot UI connected to a mock AI backend. Supports real-time responses, dark/light mode, and multi-device chat sync using Firebase.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: A responsive weather app fetching live data from OpenWeatherMap API. Features location search, 5-day forecast, temperature units toggle, and dynamic weather backgrounds.

title: Student Management Panel
description: A full-stack dashboard for managing student records, attendance, results, and course tracking. Includes admin login and Google Sheets integration.

title: Minimal Portfolio Template
description: A fully responsive personal portfolio built with React and Bootstrap. Includes CMS-ready JSON structure for easy updates to content, services, and testimonials.
